title: [CRASH]
body: in champ select i banned ivern then the client crashed with no error message.  is rito telling me to not ban ivern? :P

replies.body:
Crashes in champ select usually stem from an unstable connection to the servers. Champ Select requires a more stable connection than other sections of the client. [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
